solution_line_template: A gallon of milk makes ${butter_value_per_gallon} worth of butter because {sticks_per_gallon} x {butter_price_per_stick} = <<{sticks_per_gallon}*{butter_price_per_stick}={butter_value_per_gallon}>>{butter_value_per_gallon}
She gets {total_milk_produced} gallons of milk because {milk_per_cow} x {num_cows} = <<{milk_per_cow}*{num_cows}={total_milk_produced}>>{total_milk_produced}
She earns ${total_earnings} selling the milk because {total_milk_produced} x ${milk_price_per_gallon} = <<{total_milk_produced}*{milk_price_per_gallon}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}
